first_translate: if his grace came all this way here for something...
it’s because he was worried about lady fiona, of course.
worried...?

hangle: 그걸 믿을 바에는 차라리 내일 세계가 멸망한다는 말을 신뢰하겠어요.
first_translate: I’d sooner believe that the world will end tomorrow than think that.

hangle: 뭐…. 각하께서 워낙에 성격이 배배 꼬인 분이니까요.
first_translate: well... you know how his grace has such a twisted personality.

hangle: 그러니까요. 솔직히 성격도 좋은 편은 아니잖아요.
first_translate: exactly. let's just say he isn’t exactly known for being kind-hearted either.

hangle: 매우 나쁘죠. 표현하는 방법은 더더욱 꼬였고요.
first_translate: in fact, he can be quite cruel at times. not only is his behavior bad, but so are his words.
that may make him hard to understand sometimes,

hangle: 이번에는 진짜로 아가씨를 걱정해서 온 게 맞습니다.
first_translate: but trust me when I tell you that he really did come out of concern for her ladyship today.

hangle: 애초에 피오나 아가씨에게 집행까지 시킬 생각이 없었을걸요?
first_translate: his grace never had any intention of making lady fiona carry out the execution from the start anyway.

hangle: 진짜요? 그냥 감시하러 온 게 아니라요?
first_translate: really? then why else would he come if not to keep tabs on us?

hangle: 각하는 감시가 필요한 사람에게는 애초부터 일을 맡기지 않는답니다.
first_translate: the commander doesn’t give jobs to people he thinks need supervision.
at any rate,

hangle: 피오나 아가씨는 좀 더 자신감을 가지셔도 괜찮습니다.
first_translate: lady fiona needs to learn to have more confidence in herself.
not that I’m entirely certain what his grace is thinking right now...
well, we’ll find out soon enough.

hangle: 전 따뜻한 마실 거라도 사 올 테니,
first_translate: let me go get some hot drinks while you finish up your snowman.
let me go get some hot drinks while you finish up your snowman.
okay...
concerned...
mm... there’s no use dwelling over it too much.
I might as well play with siegren instead.
siegren,
can you help me put these two parts together?
alright...
done.
thanks.
now I’ve got to smooth everything out.
fiona.
what do you plan on doing after this?
I don’t know. probably continue living like I am now.
n-no... that wasn’t my question--
siegren?
is she coming or not?
huh?
what did you say?
is she going to visit me?
is she going to visit me?
uh... where?
to see me!
me!
wait, does that mean...

hangle: 시그렌이 자길 만나러 올 거냐고 물은 거지?
first_translate: you’re asking whether I’m gonna come meet you later?
siegren...
forget it...
don’t worry about answering that...
your pity won’t last forever.
I already knew that.
I shouldn’t have said anything--
no! I promise I'll come!
my hand...
every single day!
there’s no need to push yourself that far though...

hangle: 괜찮아, 먼저 친하게 지내자고 한 건 내 쪽이었잖아?
first_translate: it’s okay. I'm the one who asked to become friends first, remember?
so,
I swear I’ll always come to see you.
got it?
why aren’t you saying anything?! did I say something wrong?
why aren’t you saying anything?! did I say something wrong?
aah... this feels awkward. sheep or prince?

hangle: 양 한 마리…. 양 두 마리….
first_translate: one little lamb... two little lambs...
fiona.

hangle: 당분간은…. 네가 날 만나러 와야 하겠지.
first_translate: from now on... you’ll have to come see me every time.
of course.

hangle: 그거야 시그렌이 헤일론 성으로 올 수는 없으니까.
first_translate: that goes without saying since you can’t leave airelle castle.
but someday,

hangle: 내가 널 만나러 갈 수 있도록 노력할게.
first_translate: I’ll try harder so that I can come see you myself.

hangle: 그, 우린 친구인데 항상 너만 날 보러 오는 건 불공평하잖아.
first_translate: i-it wouldn’t be fair if you were the only one visiting me all the time since we’re supposed to be friends.
and besides, traveling back and forth could also be tiring for you.
haelon castle,

hangle: 아무나 함부로 들어올 수 없는 장소다.
first_translate: where I reside, is not somewhere anyone can enter freely.
going there would mean...

hangle: 적어도 헤일론 영지에서 일정한 위치로 올라가겠다는 뜻.
first_translate: ...that you've risen through the ranks within haelon territory.
all of which...
...would be done solely to visit me.

hangle: 물론 난 아무것도 가진 게 없는 고아니까,
first_translate: of course, I realize those are empty promises considering I’m nothing but an orphan girl with nothing to offer,

hangle: 이런 말을 해도 믿을 수는 없겠지만-.
first_translate: which makes them impossible to believe.
no, I believe you.

hangle: 시그렌 너는 충분히 할 수 있을 거야.
first_translate: I truly believe you can achieve whatever you set your heart to, siegren.
on top of that,
I’m positive that one day...

hangle: 분명 아주 많은 것을 가지게 될 거야.
first_translate: ...you’ll gain many things.

hangle: 성장한 그는 훗날 눈부신 미래를 맞이하게 될 것이다.
first_translate: as he grows older, he shall greet a dazzling future ahead of him.
he will live a life filled with wealth, honor, power,
and most importantly...

hangle: 마음의 상처를 치유해 줄 사랑스러운 연인이 있는 행복한 삶을.
first_translate: ...a loving partner who heals the wounds of his past.
I promise you that.

hangle: 아니, 내가 그렇게 될 수 있도록 도울게.
first_translate: or rather, I vow to help you reach that goal.

hangle: 너의 상처를 본 순간 그렇게 다짐했으니까.
first_translate: this is something I swore upon seeing your scars.
promise.
now, let’s hurry up and finish our snowmen!
right...

hangle: 내가 진정으로 시그렌의 친구가 된 어느 겨울날의 일이었다.
first_translate: it happened during winter, on the very same night I became siegren’s friend.
several days passed by...
five years later
arghh...
I must have been crazy.
who sets their story in a place as freezing as haelon?
an endless winter? seriously?
it’s so cold!
it’s been five whole years since I arrived in haelon,
and yet I still struggle to fight off the biting chill.
I turned 18 recently.
